  <tr style="border: 1px solid grey;">
    <td>**User's locations**</td>
    <td> _longitude, latitude_</td>
    <td>Geographic location from the GPS sensor of the device hold by the user

  <tr style="border: 1px solid grey;">
    <td>**User's view direction/tablet orientation**</td>
    <td> _compass_</td>
    <td>Compass heading (in °) of the magnetic compass sensor

  </tr>
  <tr style="border: 1px solid grey;">
    <td>**User's velocity**</td>
    <td> _speed_</td>
    <td>Speed (in m/s) from the GPS sensor of the device hold by the user while walking around 
    (determined via Doppler effect)</td>
  </tr>
